title: Beyond Gravity to supply robotic arm thrusters for Swissto12 small GEOs
summary:
Beyond Gravity has secured a contract to deliver robotic arm thruster pointing mechanisms for the small satellites Swissto12 is building for geostationary orbit.

title: NASA Helps Connect Astronomers and Community Colleges Across the Nation
summary: The NASA Community College Network (NCCN) and the American Astronomical Society (AAS) have teamed up to provide an exciting and impactful program that brings top astronomy researchers into the classrooms of community colleges around the United States. title: Lunar Challenge Winner Tests Technology in NASA Thermal Vacuum Chamber
summary: By Savannah Bullard One year after winning second place in NASA’s Break the Ice Lunar Challenge, members of the small business Starpath visited NASA’s Marshall Space Flight Center in Huntsville, Alabama, as part of their prize opportunity to test their upgraded lunar regolith excavation and transportation rover in the center’s 20-foot thermal vacuum chamber. title: Golden Lake
summary: Golden sunglint highlights Lake Balkhash in this May 31, 2016, photo taken from the International Space Station. title: Germany Commits €35 Billion to Space-Related Defence Projects
summary:
During his address at Germany’s third annual Space Congress, Defence Minister Boris Pistorius announced that Germany would invest €35 billion in space-related defence projects by 2030. “The conflicts of the future will no longer be limited to the Earth’s surface or the deep sea. They will also be fought openly in orbit,” said Pistorius. “That’s […]
